page.title: 16Shops in North Leigh
page.content: In North Leigh there are only four shops because North Leigh is a small place. The Windmill Stores is as small supermarket. Its trade is selling all kinds of foods. There is a Post Office in Common Road which sells sweets and tinned food and different sorts of things. The butchers, which is in Park Road, sells meat. There is also a Newspaper shop but it only sells newspapers. Most people in North Leigh would go to Witney to buy their food because there are plenty of shops in Witney and not enough in North Leigh. Most people would probably travel into Oxford to buy their clothes. by Paul Thompson
